title: Lesson 10
paragraph: Basic communicative and reporting verbs used in conversations, news, and messages.

words.meaning: to say or do something again
to answer in words or writing
words.example: He replied to the email quickly.

words.meaning: to give information about something observed or investigated
words.example: She reported the incident to the manager.

words.meaning: to come or go back to a place
words.example: He returned the book to the library.

words.meaning: to sit on and travel by a vehicle or animal
words.example: We rode the train to the city.

words.meaning: to make a bell-like sound or to call by phone
to keep something for future use or to rescue

words.example: Search the site for the document.

words.meaning: to give the impression of being
to give something in exchange for money
words.example: They sell fresh bread every morning.

words.meaning: to cause something to go to a destination
words.example: Please send the report by Friday.
